publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1136# Mr Andrew Welsh: Scotland's Equine Sports Industry-That the Parliament acknowledges the importance of Scotland's equine sports industry for the development of Scotland's rural economy; commends the work of the Scottish Equestrian Association in seeking to coordinate equine-related policy decisions, and believes that the Scottish Executive should set up a dedicated equine industry team within its Environment and Rural Affairs Department. Supported by: Ms Rosemary Byrne*, John Farquhar Munro*, Miss Annabel Goldie*, Alex Fergusson*, Dr Elaine Murray*, John Scott*, Alex Johnstone*, Irene Oldfather*
S2M-1136# Scotland's Equine Sports Industry (lodged on 31 March 2004) Christine Grahame*, Alex Neil*

S2M-1136# Mr Andrew Welsh: Scotland's Equine Sports Industry-That the Parliament acknowledges the importance of Scotland's equine sports industry for the development of Scotland's rural economy; commends the work of the Scottish Equestrian Association in seeking to coordinate equine-related policy decisions, and believes that the Scottish Executive should set up a dedicated equine industry team within its Environment and Rural Affairs Department. Supported by: Ms Rosemary Byrne, John Farquhar Munro, Miss Annabel Goldie, Alex Fergusson, Dr Elaine Murray, John Scott, Alex Johnstone, Irene Oldfather, Christine Grahame, Alex Neil, Shiona Baird*, Mark Ballard*, Chris Ballance*, Eleanor Scott*, Robin Harper*, Dr Jean Turner*, Colin Fox*
S2M-1136# Scotland's Equine Sports Industry (lodged on 31 March 2004) Ms Sandra White*
S2M-1136# Scotland's Equine Sports Industry (lodged on 31 March 2004) John Swinburne*
S2M-1136# Scotland's Equine Sports Industry (lodged on 31 March 2004) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-1136# Scotland's Equine Sports Industry (lodged on 31 March 2004) Phil Gallie*
